com.nutiteq.editable

Interface EditableMapView.EditEventListener

  • Enclosing class:
    EditableMapView

    public static interface EditableMapView.EditEventListener
    Listener interface for catching various events during map editing interactions.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

    • Method Detail

      • updateUI

        void updateUI()
        Elements were changed - update UI buttons may be needed

      • snapElement

        com.nutiteq.components.Vector snapElement(com.nutiteq.geometry.VectorElement element,
                                        com.nutiteq.components.Vector delta)
        Adjust object movement, usable for snapping
        Parameters:
        element - which was moved
        delta - element movement Vector
        Returns:
        adjusted movement Vector if snapping is done, same as input if not

      • snapElementVertex

        com.nutiteq.components.MapPos snapElementVertex(com.nutiteq.geometry.VectorElement element,
                                              int index,
                                              com.nutiteq.components.MapPos mapPos)
        Adjust vertex movement, useful for snapping
        Parameters:
        element - element which was edited
        index - index of vertex which was edited
        mapPos - A MapPos where vertex was moved to
        Returns:
        adjusted MapPos if snapping is done, same as input mapPos if not

      • onElementCreated

        void onElementCreated(com.nutiteq.geometry.VectorElement element)
        New element was created. Can be used to customize element attributes
        Parameters:
        element - the element that was created.

      • onBeforeElementChange

        void onBeforeElementChange(com.nutiteq.geometry.VectorElement element)
        Called before element is being modified.
        Parameters:
        element - object before editing

      • onElementChanged

        void onElementChanged(com.nutiteq.geometry.VectorElement element)
        Called after element was modified.
        Parameters:
        element - object after editing it

      • onElementDeleted

        void onElementDeleted(com.nutiteq.geometry.VectorElement element)
        Called after element was deleted.
        Parameters:
        element - deleted element

      • onElementSelected

        boolean onElementSelected(com.nutiteq.geometry.VectorElement element)
        Called when element is just selected. Can be used to disallow element selection.
        Parameters:
        element - element that was deleted
        Returns:
        true if element is selectable, false otherwise

      • onElementDeselected

        void onElementDeselected(com.nutiteq.geometry.VectorElement element)
        Called when element is unselected.
        Parameters:
        element - object which was unselected

      • onDragStart

        void onDragStart(com.nutiteq.geometry.VectorElement element,
               float x,
               float y)
        Called before vertex or element is dragged
        Parameters:
        element - object which is selected during drag
        x - start X of dragging, in screen pixels
        y - start Y of dragging

      • onDrag

        void onDrag(float x,
          float y)
        Object or vertex was dragged to specific location
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate in screen pixels
        y - y coordinate in screen pixels

      • onDragEnd

        boolean onDragEnd(float x,
                float y)
        Object drag is finished, touch is released
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate in screen pixels of the final position
        y - y coordinate in screen pixels of the final position
        Returns:
        true if point should be deleted
